about_the_game:
Buy the Monster Energy Supercross 3 - Allegiance Pack now and show your loyalty to your favorite bike manufacturer!

It includes 2 backgrounds for the game menu, dedicated to each one of the bike manufacturer present in the game: Honda, Husqvarna, Kawasaki, KTM, Suzuki, Yamaha. The manufacturer logo will be also shown next to the player's name.
detailed_description:
Buy the Monster Energy Supercross 3 - Allegiance Pack now and show your loyalty to your favorite bike manufacturer!

It includes 2 backgrounds for the game menu, dedicated to each one of the bike manufacturer present in the game: Honda, Husqvarna, Kawasaki, KTM, Suzuki, Yamaha. The manufacturer logo will be also shown next to the player's name.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 3.2 GHz - AMD A10-7850K, 3.7 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 2GB - AMD Radeon R7 370X 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4820K 3.7 GHz - AMD Ryzen 7 1700x
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB - AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Buy the Monster Energy Supercross 3 - Allegiance Pack now and show your loyalty to your favorite bike manufacturer!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
